snippet: The mother of Lauren Abraham, who was electrocuted by a downed wire during Hurricane Sandy, accused the utility of negligence.
abstract: Kim Tinnin, mother of 23-year-old Lauren Abraham, who was electrocuted by downed power line in Queens during Hurricane Sandy, files wrongful-death lawsuit against Con Edison; suit accuses utility of negligence in failing to shut down power before storm hit.
lead_paragraph: The mother of Lauren Abraham, who was electrocuted by a downed wire during Hurricane Sandy, accused the utility of negligence.

headline.main: Con Ed Sued Over Woman’s Death in Hurricane
headline.print_headline: Con Ed Sued Over Woman’s Death in Hurricane
